title: 02/15/21 – Hour 1 – How Worried Should The Lakers Be About Anthony Davis’ Injury? Guest – Jon Paul Morosi
itunes:title: 02/15/21 – Hour 1 – How Worried Should The Lakers Be About Anthony Davis’ Injury? Guest – Jon Paul Morosi
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb sit in for Dan Patrick and react to Anthony Davis’ scary injury to his Achilles tendon on Sunday night. The guys discuss how worried the Lakers organization should be and speak with FOX Sports MLB reporter Jon Paul Morosi about the moves the Dodgers made this offseason to position themselves as repeat-champions. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
